name: Will Hall Online
description:
Will Hall Online was founded in 2008 to freelance for private clients and provide white label development services for several agencies around the UK. Will's passion for the internet, and everything techie, meant that he soon became a regular fixture on the geek meet scene and referrals followed.
Having worked with many designers and developers he wanted to be able to bring together a group of fabulous individuals who worked intuitively, complemented each other.
